about_the_game:
Story.
In the year 20XX, humanity was on the verge of extinction when an ancient weapon suddenly emerged from the ground and attacked the city.
However, there was something gained in exchange for the destruction of the city.
Humanity studied the enemy ancient weapon as a counterforce and used its technology to create a magical battalion.
As the commander of the magic battalion, you must destroy the enemy that is approaching the city and survive the crisis of human extinction!


Game Overview.
A TPS action game in which you fight enemies with free strategy!
Use the skill tree to unlock your favorite skills, up to 8 skills can be set!
Use the skills you've set up to take on missions!


About the missions.
The missions are divided into three phases

In the case of a defensive mission

Phase 1 : Set up buildings and other preparations before the enemy attacks.
Phase 2 : As the enemy attacks,
Final phase: The boss will be attacked and more enemies will appear.

Phase 2: Enemies attack the boss, and more enemies appear.

In addition to defensive battles, there are other missions
Chasing and capturing the enemy in order to recover supplies stolen by the enemy
The final phase: more enemies will appear as the bosses attack!

There are four stages: cove, city, plain, and island.
There are three missions per stage, for a total of 12 missions!


Controls during the missions.
This game is a TPS action game.
As a force against the enemy, the player fights with guns and troops while building.
[gun].
　　Guns that can be set up with special spheres, and bullets can be switched by button input while in bullet mode.
【Troopers】.
　　A squad member who follows the player. Up to five members can be dispatched to a building.
【Building
　　The more members you have, the more you can build. The more members you have, the faster you can build.
　　While in building mode, you can switch between different buildings by pressing a button.
